alert.note: Alert for Eastern Panhandle, Crescent Lake NWR (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 27 at 2:25PM CDT until March 28 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT MONDAY FOR STRONG WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY... The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a Red Flag Warning FOR STRONG WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, which is in effect from noon to 7 PM MDT Monday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...In NEZ204...Fire Weather Zone 204 Eastern Panhandle/Crescent Lake NWR. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Temperatures...In the lower 70s. * Impacts...Weather conditions could become favorable for rapid fire growth and erratic fire behavior. Fires may quickly become out of control.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
